item.content:encoded: I’ve ripped out all of the nofollow tagging that WordPress was doing to the links in the comments. So feel free to comment away with the confidence that you’ll still get your Google Juice. Why did I bother doing this? Because it doesn’t work, I was still receiving hundreds and hundreds of spam comments after my upgrade to WP 1.5. So leaving it in there was only hurting those legit comments. I’ll say it one more time, if your solution doesn’t PREVENT the problem, then it isn’t really a solution.
